mapper.insert: insert into resource (id, res_code, res_name, res_desc, res_type, res_url) values (#{id}, #{resCode}, #{resName}, #{resDesc}, #{resType}, #{resUrl})
mapper.update: update resource set res_code = #{resCode}, res_name = #{resName}, res_desc = #{resDesc}, res_type = #{resType}, res_url = #{resUrl} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, res_code, res_name, res_desc, res_type, res_url from resource
